# Pull Request

## Description

<!-- Briefly describe what this PR changes and why -->

## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Feature Reference

<!-- Link to feature_list.json if applicable -->
- Feature ID: F0XX (if applicable)

## Testing

- [ ] Tests added/updated
- [ ] Manual testing completed
- [ ] Edge Runtime constraints verified (no Node.js APIs)

## Quality Gates

- [ ] Format check passes (`pnpm run format --check`)
- [ ] Lint passes (`pnpm run lint`)
- [ ] Type check passes (`pnpm run typecheck`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`pnpm run test`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`pnpm run build`)

## Deployment

- [ ] Changes work on Vercel Edge Runtime
- [ ] 9-second timeout constraint respected
- [ ] Environment variables documented (if new ones added)

## Documentation

- [ ] CLAUDE.md updated (if architecture changed)
- [ ] plan.md updated (if phase changed)
- [ ] todo.md updated
- [ ] feature_list.json updated (if feature completed)

## Edge Runtime Constraints

- [ ] Only Web APIs used (fetch, crypto.subtle, ReadableStream)
- [ ] No Node.js APIs (fs, Buffer, crypto.createHmac)
- [ ] No file system operations
